library(phastCons100way.UCSC.hg19)
library(caret)
fitControl <- trainControl(method = "cv",
                           number = 5,
                           classProbs = TRUE,
                           summaryFunction = twoClassSummary)

TwoFeature314_train <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/TwoFeature314_train.rds")
TwoFeature314_test <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/TwoFeature314_test.rds")
TwoFeature16_train <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/TwoFeature16_train.rds")
TwoFeature16_test <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/TwoFeature16_test.rds")

Data314_train <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/Data314_train.rds")

#data314
varImp_Data314 <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/varImp_Data314.rds")
varImp_Data314r <- readRDS("/home/zhendi/varImp_Data314r.rds")
#for loop
AUC_Gen_svm_314<-as.double(c(1:2))
for(i in 1:nrow(varImp_Data314)){
  top_selected <- which(colnames(Data314_train)%in%varImp_Data314r[1:i]==TRUE)
  selected_matrix <- Data314_train[,c(top_selected,ncol(Data314_train))]
  set.seed(825)
  Gen_314_svmfit<-train(label ~ ., data =   Data314_train[,c(top_selected,ncol(Data314_train))],
                        method = "svmRadial",
                        trControl = fitControl,
                        preProc=c("center","scale"),
                        metric="ROC")
  #Data314_test$svmpredi<-predict(Gen_314_svmfit,Data314_test,type = "prob")[,1]
  #pred_Gen_svm_314<-prediction(Data314_test$svmpredi,Data314_test$label)
  #AUC_Gen_svm_314[i]<-as.double(performance(pred_Gen_svm_314,measure = "auc")@y.values)
  AUC_Gen_svm_314[i]<- max(Gen_314_svmfit$results$ROC)
}

AUC_Gen_svm_314<-cbind(AUC_Gen_svm_314,c(1:length(AUC_Gen_svm_314)))
feature<-c(1:nrow(AUC_Gen_svm_314))

ggplot(data = as.data.frame(AUC_Gen_svm_314), mapping = aes(x = feature, y = AUC_Gen_svm_314)) + geom_line()

#top index
index_svm_M314<-which(AUC_Gen_svm_314==max(AUC_Gen_svm_314),arr.ind=TRUE)
top_selected_svm_M314<-which(colnames(Data314_train)%in%varImp_Data314r[1:index_svm_M314]==TRUE)
#pre_processed data
M314_biof_training_svm=Data314_train[,c(top_selected_svm_M314,ncol(Data314_train))]
M314_biof_testing_svm=Data314_test[,c(top_selected_svm_M314,ncol(Data314_train))]
#svm again
set.seed(825)
svmfit_two_F314<-train(label~.,data=M314_biof_training_svm,
                       method = "svmRadial",
                       trControl = fitControl,
                       preProc=c("center","scale"),
                       metric="ROC")
svmPre_F_Two314<-predict(svmfit_two_F314,newdata=M314_biof_testing_svm,type="prob")
roc_svm_F_Two314<-roc(M314_biof_testing_svm$label,as.vector(svmPre_F_Two314)[,1])

plot(roc_svm_F_Two314,print.auc=TRUE,main="svm_roc_two_F314")
